title: Fat freedom
creator_credit: Richard Capaner, Derek Lamb and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Using soft washes of colour, this animated film portrays a man’s desire to escape his heavy human body, changing it into forms that let him fly, dance and rejoice and allow him to express his inner needs and fantasies. Music by Ben Low.
